flavorText: The Cho-Arrim call it "the fury of Ramos."

foreignData.name: Vulkanischer Wirbelwind
foreignData.text: Der Vulkanische Wirbelwind fügt X Schadenspunkte zu, aufgeteilt auf eine beliebige Anzahl von Kreaturen Deiner Wahl, wobei X die Anzahl an Kreaturen im Spiel ist.

name: Volcanic Wind
originalText: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures in play.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined at the time you announce this spell, and you choose the targets and the division of damage among those targets as part of the announcement as well.
If there are no creatures on the battlefield when you cast this, you do not pick any targets and it deals no damage.

text: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield as you cast this spell.
